Text:
Thanks G, Here's the advice I gave XP:

I would recommend that you use http://bayimg.com/ to show the covers, make sure you click 
Settings
Resize to:
[x] 300x300 TPB torrent image

Only copy 9 digit code from end of address with no spaces/extra characters or TPB freaks out. Makes torrents look better and easier to tell by thumbnail which issue. :D
thanks for the advise friend. I'll try it next week.
is there any new spawn or any recent crossovers
oh any "tales from the crypt" or old horror comics would be awsome
